topic.title: Should I Blog Here?
topic.body:
I'm really fascinated by ZeroNet, and want to have a reason to "be around", but finding it difficult to latch on to anything.

In "Internet Land", I'm starting a PD blog on the science of greatness. Think topics like productivity, philosophy, health, wealth, management and other things that fascinate me and I research from a scientific / first principle perspective.

Should I stick around? Would anyone read if I began blogging here?
